item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: I lied, Im pretty certain what it does is adds to each base number the number for days you threw. for most throws this means your minimum for most throws is 4 since you throw 3. Emo CDs give +5 for a minimum throw of 6 and a Sealed Kunai would give +1 if it wasn't already an automatic max points

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: Having multiples of the same perm never stacks. Otherwise people would put all their money into chakra armors and desert robes. I'm thinking the second effect simply means all 3 of your throws get a base +1

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded:
What I'm interested in is the actual effect of the dartboard. +1 base number per dart thrown? My theories were as followed:
1. The value of each dart is increased by 1 for the first, 2 for the second, and 3 for the third. Wouldn't know, since it doesn't tell me what I got without the dartboard helping (if it even does)
2. Each throw attempt you do increases the base value of each dart by 1 (disproven; threw thirteen times at one point and got a 4, 8, and 4.)

Also, maybe you just have to have at least one other person throw that day? On my account, there were thirteen attempts, and I just bought 261 kunai and threw 'em all. Got my dartboard.

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: yes, the last throw to 101 has to be made by another villager.

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded:
I would say that it has to be over 100, not 100 exactly because I, on my alt, got 24 K ryo, bought 300 kunai, and proceeded to throw all that I can. I managed to 1: Get the high score, and 2: Get a triple bullseye.

But this is not about accomplishments, the thing is, a little note on the bottom said " Note: If you have the current high score, and there are alteast 100 throws at the dartboard, then your throws will not count towards the total number of throws" I dont think that is verbatem, but that is basically what it said. Which would lead me to belive that you cant just buy 300 kunai to throw at the dart board for a free dart board, that you have to have cooperation from someone else.

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: Confirmed several times in my village. 100+ plays = dartboard. Technically, it might be >100 since we have never had a day with 100 plays exactly, though someone won one with 101 plays.

item.content:encoded: hmm got dartboard today with 114 plays I believe
